SEARCH
Package starter.code

Class FitnessTrackerTest2

java.lang.Object
starter.code.FitnessTrackerTest2
class FitnessTrackerTest2 extends Object
Test class for testing FitnessTracker class, uses JUnit version 5. The tested methods are expected to push out an error message exactly like the one specify in the method to handle invalid arguments. Only arguments used for the method will be passed into the method. Other parameter, if it is String, will be "". If it is int or double, will be 0
Version:
5.11
Author:
Tran Duc Anh Tuan
